products.name: Neural Interface v3.2

products.description: Retractable carbon-fiber forearm blades. Slice through corporate lies and enemy flesh with equal ease.

products.description: Enhanced optical implants with night vision, zoom, and target analysis. See the matrix for what it really is.

products.name: Smart Pistol
products.description: Auto-targeting sidearm with AI assistance. Thinks faster than you do, shoots faster than your enemies can hide.

products.name: Plasma Rifle
products.description: High-energy weapon that melts through armor like butter. Corporate security's worst nightmare.

products.name: Mono-molecular Katana
products.description: Traditional blade with a modern twist. Edge sharpened to molecular level cuts through anything.

products.name: ICE Breaker v2.0
products.description: Advanced hacking suite. Penetrate the most secure corporate networks. Leaves no digital footprints.

products.name: Ghost Protocol
products.description: Ultimate stealth program. Become invisible in both digital and physical realms. Used by the best netrunners.

products.name: Data Miner Pro
products.description: Extract valuable intel from any system. Turn information into power, power into eddies.

products.name: Holographic Display
products.description: Portable 3D interface projector. Make reality more interesting with augmented overlays.

products.name: Personal Drone
products.description: Autonomous surveillance and utility drone. Your eyes and hands where you can't be.

products.name: Neural Stimulator
